solution_line_template: Dan spent an hour doing {low_paid_tasks} tasks * ${low_paid_rate} = ${low_paid_total}.
Dan spent an hour doing {high_paid_tasks} tasks * ${high_paid_rate} each = $<<{high_paid_tasks}*{high_paid_rate}={high_paid_total}>>{high_paid_total}.
Dan made ${low_paid_total} - ${high_paid_total} = $<<{low_paid_total}-{high_paid_total}={difference}>>{difference} per hour more doing the higher paid work.
